2.0.0: Support for the 'Global OAuth client' (see more at https://developer.zendesk.com/documentation/marketplace/building-a-marketplace-app/set-up-a-global-oauth-client/#requesting-a-global-oauth-client)
2.0.1: Fix the issue when the `globalKeys` configuration key is set to false.
3.0.0: Major upgrade of all components, making them more user friendly and complete.
